description.value:
Does a ping check to make sure that a target server host is available. Has metrics for Availability (percent) and Availability Violations (when Avail is zero). Availability is based on 4 tests i.e Successful DNS lookup, Reverse DNS, TCP Connect and Ping.
Create a chart with Avail and Violation to provide an overall SLA dashboard for exec audience and plot individual measures like Ping, TCP Connect, DNS and Reverse DNS to get individual measures.

property.label: Execute TCP Check
property.description: If checked the plugin will check to see if a TCP connection can be made to the specified server.

property.label: Max TCP Return Time
property.description: The max allowed time for the response to the ping in ms.

property.label: Execute Ping Test
property.description: Execute PING test on the target Host

property.label: Ping Wait Time (secs)
property.description: Max time in seconds for PING command to wait before aborting

metric.name: TCP Lock Time
metric.description: Returns the time taken to secure a Socket Lock on TCP Port 7

metric.name: Ping Violation
metric.description: Count of no of times Ping failed
